foreignData.flavorText: 「宇宙は私の楽器で、私がそこから奏でる歌は、あなたが聞くことを許されない歌です。」

foreignData.flavorText:
„Dein Todeskampf wird nur einen Augenblick dauern, aber es wird sich wie eine Ewigkeit anfühlen."

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.flavorText:

Arrester's Admonition.name: Arrester's Admonition

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Arrester’s Admonition tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You don’t draw a card if you cast it during your main phase.

Addendum abilities of instant spells apply while the spell is resolving, not immediately after casting it. If the spell is countered, you don’t get the addendum bonus. For example, if you cast Sphinx’s Insight during your main phase, you gain 2 life during its resolution, after you draw two cards.
If a spell with an addendum ability is copied, the copy won’t give you the addendum bonus. This is because the copy wasn’t cast at all.

Arrester's Admonition.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, draw a card.

foreignData.name: Hemmende Formel
foreignData.text:
Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält -4/-0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
Ziehe eine Karte.
Addendum — Falls du diesen Zauberspruch in deiner Hauptphase gewirkt hast, tappe die Kreatur und sie enttappt nicht während des nächsten Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.

foreignData.name: Código de represión
foreignData.text:
La criatura objetivo obtiene -4/-0 hasta el final del turno.
Roba una carta.
Adenda — Si lanzas este hechizo durante tu fase principal, gira esa criatura y no se endereza durante el próximo paso de enderezar de su controlador.

foreignData.name: Code de contrainte
foreignData.text:
La créature ciblée gagne -4/-0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
Piochez une carte.
Addenda — Si vous avez lancé ce sort pendant votre phase principale, engagez cette créature et elle ne se dégage pas pendant la prochaine étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.

foreignData.name: Codice di Costrizione
foreignData.text:
Una creatura bersaglio prende -4/-0 fino alla fine del turno.
Pesca una carta.
Appendice — Se hai lanciato questa magia durante la tua fase principale, TAPpa quella creatura ed essa non STAPpa durante il prossimo STAP del suo controllore.

foreignData.name: 制動規範
foreignData.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－４/－０の修整を受ける。
カードを１枚引く。
附則 ― あなたがこの呪文をあなたのメイン・フェイズ中に唱えていたなら、そのクリーチャーをタップする。そのクリーチャーはそれのコントローラーの次のアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。

foreignData.name: 통제 규약
foreignData.text:
생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -4/-0을 받는다.
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
부록 — 당신이 이 주문을 당신의 본단계에 발동했다면, 그 생물을 탭한다. 그 생물은 조종자의 다음 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.

foreignData.name: Código de Restrição
foreignData.text:
A criatura alvo recebe -4/-0 até o final do turno.
Compre um card.
Adendo — Se você conjurou esta mágica durante sua fase principal, vire aquela criatura e ela não será desvirada durante a próxima etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.

foreignData.name: Кодекс Ограничений
foreignData.text:
Целевое существо получает -4/-0 до конца хода.
Возьмите карту.
Приложение — Если вы разыграли это заклинание во время вашей главной фазы, поверните то существо, и оно не разворачивается во время следующего шага разворота контролирующего его игрока.

foreignData.name: 拘捕守则
foreignData.text:
目标生物得-4/-0直到回合结束。
抓一张牌。
附案～如果你是在你的行动阶段施放此咒语，则横置该生物，且它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

foreignData.name: 拘捕守則
foreignData.text:
目標生物得-4/-0直到回合結束。
抽一張牌。
附案～如果你是在你的行動階段施放此咒語，則橫置該生物，且它於其操控者的下一個重置步驟中不能重置。

Code of Constraint.name: Code of Constraint

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Code of Constraint tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You don’t draw a card.
Code of Constraint can target a creature that’s already tapped. If you cast it during your main phase, that creature won’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

Addendum abilities of instant spells apply while the spell is resolving, not immediately after casting it. If the spell is countered, you don’t get the addendum bonus. For example, if you cast Sphinx’s Insight during your main phase, you gain 2 life during its resolution, after you draw two cards.
If a spell with an addendum ability is copied, the copy won’t give you the addendum bonus. This is because the copy wasn’t cast at all.

Code of Constraint.text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

foreignData.flavorText: Für einen siegreichen Kampf musst du deine Feinde weise wählen.
foreignData.name: Vertreibungsmagierin
foreignData.text: Wenn die Vertreibungsmagierin ins Spiel kommt, bringe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: Para tener éxito en un combate hay que empezar por saber con quién merece la pena luchar.

foreignData.flavorText: Un combat réussi commence par savoir qui vaut la peine d'être affronté.

foreignData.flavorText: 성공적인 전투는 누구와 싸우는 게 좋은지를 아는 것부터 시작된다.

foreignData.flavorText: As batalhas bem-sucedidas começam por saber com quem vale a pena lutar.

foreignData.text: Quando Maga da Exclusão entrar no campo de batalha, devolva a criatura alvo que um oponente controla para a mão de seu dono.

foreignData.flavorText: Успешные битвы начинаются с понимания, с кем стоит сражаться.

foreignData.text: Когда Маг Исключений выходит на поле битвы, верните целевое существо под контролем оппонента в руку его владельца.

foreignData.flavorText: 胜利之路，从挑选打得过的对手开始。

foreignData.flavorText: 勝利之路，從挑選打得過的對手開始。

foreignData.text: 當排拒法師進戰場時，將目標由對手操控的生物移回其擁有者手上。

Exclusion Mage.name: Exclusion Mage
Exclusion Mage.text: When Exclusion Mage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

foreignData.flavorText: Feuermähne Nevena führte den siegreichen Angriff auf die Rebellen des Barbu-Dachs. Daraufhin setzten die Gildenfreien ein Kopfgeld auf sie aus.
foreignData.name: Feuerschweif-Rächerin
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Bataillon — Immer wenn die Feuerschweif-Rächerin und mindestens zwei andere Kreaturen angreifen, fügt die Feuerschweif-Rächerin einem Ziel deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu und du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: La melenafuego Nevena lideró el victorioso asalto a los rebeldes de la Azotea de Barbu. Ahora los sinportal han decretado su muerte.
foreignData.name: Vengadora melenafuego
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Batallón — Siempre que la Vengadora melenafuego y al menos otras dos criaturas ataquen, la Vengadora melenafuego hace 3 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo y tú ganas 3 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: C'est Névéna Crinefeu qui a mené l'assaut victorieux sur les insurgés du Toit de Berbu. Les Sans porte ont juré d'avoir sa tête.
foreignData.name: Vengeresse crinefeu
foreignData.text:
Vol
Bataillon — À chaque fois que la Vengeresse crinefeu et au moins deux autres créatures attaquent, la Vengeresse crinefeu inflige 3 blessures à n'importe quelle cible, et vous gagnez 3 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Nevena Chioma di Fuoco ha guidato l'assalto vittorioso contro i ribelli dei Tetti di Barbu. Ora i Senza Cancello hanno decretato la sua condanna a morte.
foreignData.name: Vendicatrice Chioma di Fuoco
foreignData.text:
Volare
Battaglione — Ogniqualvolta la Vendicatrice Chioma di Fuoco e almeno altre due creature attaccano, la Vendicatrice Chioma di Fuoco infligge 3 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio e tu guadagni 3 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 炎まといのネヴェーナはバーブの屋上民の反乱勢力に対する奇襲を指揮し、成功に導いた。今では門なしが彼女を亡き者にしようと狙っている。
foreignData.name: 炎まといの報復者
foreignData.text:
飛行
大隊 ― 炎まといの報復者と少なくとも２体の他のクリーチャーが攻撃するたび、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。炎まといの報復者はそれに３点のダメージを与え、あなたは３点のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 天使

Firemane Avenger.name: Firemane Avenger

rulings.text: If the target permanent or player is an illegal target when Firemane Avenger’s battalion ability tries to resolve, the ability won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t gain life.
If Firemane Avenger’s battalion ability resolves but some or all of the damage is prevented, you’ll still gain 3 life.
The three attacking creatures don’t have to be attacking the same player or planeswalker.
Once a battalion ability has triggered, it doesn’t matter how many creatures are still attacking when that ability resolves.
The effects of battalion abilities vary from card to card. Read each card carefully.

Firemane Avenger.text:
Flying
Battalion — Whenever Firemane Avenger and at least two other creatures attack, Firemane Avenger deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

Impulse.name: Impulse

rulings.text: This is not a draw.
Due to errata, you no longer shuffle your library.

Impulse.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

foreignData.flavorText: Obwohl sie nicht so bekannt wie die Soldaten der Armee sind, werden die Magier-Priester der Boros-Legion von den Unschuldigen respektiert und von den Geistern der Schuldigen gehasst.
foreignData.name: Blitzhelix
foreignData.text: Die Blitzhelix fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu und du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: Aunque son menos conocidos que su ejército de soldados, los magos-sacerdotes de la Legión Boros son tan respetados por los inocentes como son odiados por los fantasmas de los culpables.
foreignData.name: Hélice de relámpagos
foreignData.text: La Hélice de relámpagos hace 3 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo y tú ganas 3 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: Bien que moins connus que ses soldats, les prêtres-mage de la Légion de Boros sont autant respectés par les innocents qu'ils sont haïs par les fantômes des coupables.
foreignData.name: Hélice d'éclairs
foreignData.text: L'Hélice d'éclairs inflige 3 blessures à n'importe quelle cible et vous gagnez 3 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Benché meno conosciuti del suo esercito di soldati, i preti-maghi della Legione Boros sono tanto rispettati dagli innocenti quanto odiati dai fantasmi dei colpevoli.
foreignData.name: Spirale Fulminante
foreignData.text: La Spirale Fulminante infligge 3 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio e tu guadagni 3 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 軍団の兵士たちほど有名ではないが、ボロス軍の魔道僧侶は純潔の者に愛され、罪を負った者の霊に嫌われている。
foreignData.name: 稲妻のらせん
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。稲妻のらせんはそれに３点のダメージを与え、あなたは３点のライフを得る。

Lightning Helix.name: Lightning Helix

rulings.text: If the chosen target is illegal when Lightning Helix tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t gain 3 life.

Lightning Helix.text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

foreignData.name: Galeerenqualle
foreignData.text: Wenn die Galeerenqualle aus Deiner Hand ins Spiel kommt, bringe eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl zurück auf die Hand ihres Besitzers.

Man-o'-War.name: Man-o'-War

rulings.text: If there are no other creatures on the battlefield when Man-o’-War enters the battlefield, its ability must target itself.

Man-o'-War.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

Oath of Chandra.name: Oath of Chandra

rulings.text: Oath of Chandra’s last ability will trigger even if the planeswalker that entered the battlefield under your control is no longer on the battlefield, no longer under your control, or no longer a planeswalker. This is also true if Oath of Chandra wasn’t on the battlefield when the planeswalker entered.
The last ability triggers only once per turn, even if more than one planeswalker entered the battlefield under your control.
Each of the Oaths is legendary: if you control more than one of any particular Oath, you choose one to remain on the battlefield and the others are put into your graveyard.
The “legend rule” checks the full names of legendary permanents. You can control Oath of Gideon and Oath of Chandra at the same time, for example.

Even if you control a particular Oath, you can cast another of that Oath to take advantage of its enters-the-battlefield ability. It will enter the battlefield, causing its first ability to trigger. You will then choose one to keep, as detailed above, and then its enters-the-battlefield ability will resolve.

Oath of Chandra.text:
When Oath of Chandra enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature an opponent controls.
At the beginning of each end step, if a planeswalker entered the battlefield under your control this turn, Oath of Chandra deals 2 damage to each opponent.

Oath of Jace.name: Oath of Jace

rulings.text: If you control no planeswalkers as the last ability resolves, you won’t scry at all. Abilities that trigger whenever you scry won’t trigger.
Each of the Oaths is legendary: if you control more than one of any particular Oath, you choose one to remain on the battlefield and the others are put into your graveyard.
The “legend rule” checks the full names of legendary permanents. You can control Oath of Gideon and Oath of Chandra at the same time, for example.

Even if you control a particular Oath, you can cast another of that Oath to take advantage of its enters-the-battlefield ability. It will enter the battlefield, causing its first ability to trigger. You will then choose one to keep, as detailed above, and then its enters-the-battlefield ability will resolve.

Oath of Jace.text:
When Oath of Jace enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards.
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry X, where X is the number of planeswalkers you control.

Oath of Kaya.name: Oath of Kaya

rulings.text: If the target is an illegal target by the time the first ability of Oath of Kaya tries to resolve, the ability doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain 3 life.
If an opponent attacks more than one planeswalker you control, the last ability of Oath of Kaya triggers once for each of those attacked planeswalkers.

Oath of Kaya.text:
When Oath of Kaya enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
Whenever an opponent attacks a planeswalker you control with one or more creatures, Oath of Kaya deals 2 damage to that player and you gain 2 life.

Oath of Nissa.name: Oath of Nissa

rulings.text: Each of the Oaths is legendary: if you control more than one of any particular Oath, you choose one to remain on the battlefield and the others are put into your graveyard.
The “legend rule” checks the full names of legendary permanents. You can control Oath of Gideon and Oath of Chandra at the same time, for example.

Even if you control a particular Oath, you can cast another of that Oath to take advantage of its enters-the-battlefield ability. It will enter the battlefield, causing its first ability to trigger. You will then choose one to keep, as detailed above, and then its enters-the-battlefield ability will resolve.

Oath of Nissa.text:
When Oath of Nissa enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature, land, or planeswalker card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast planeswalker spells.

Tajic, Blade of the Legion.name: Tajic, Blade of the Legion

rulings.text: The effects of battalion abilities vary from card to card. Read each card carefully.
The three attacking creatures don’t have to be attacking the same player or planeswalker.
Once a battalion ability has triggered, it doesn’t matter how many creatures are still attacking when that ability resolves.

Tajic, Blade of the Legion.text:
Indestructible
Battalion — Whenever Tajic, Blade of the Legion and at least two other creatures attack, Tajic gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
